articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A right-wing rebel group in the US Congress have called for a vote to remove McCarthy as Speaker.
articles.title: Kevin McCarthy: US Speaker faces vote to oust him by fellow Republicans

articles.description: The House Speaker faces a vote on his future - which he may have to rely on Democrats to secure.
articles.title: Three ways the Kevin McCarthy drama could end ahead of speaker vote

articles.description: It marks an escalation of a crisis sparked by Canada linking India to the fatal shooting of a Sikh separatist.
articles.title: India asks Canada to withdraw dozens of diplomatic staff - reports

articles.description: "Les punaises", as they're known in French, are sweeping the country, spreading fear and disgust.
articles.title: Bedbug plague hits France ahead of 2024 Olympics

articles.description: Greg Fergus's first task will be to turn the page on the recent Nazi in parliament row.
articles.title: Canada MPs elect first black House of Commons Speaker

articles.description: The former US president is being tried in a civil fraud case that threatens his vast business empire.
articles.title: Trump tells BBC he will testify at appropriate time

articles.description: A US watchdog cited a risk of crashes causing serious injuries, and the firm confirmed the global recall.
articles.title: All Onewheel e-skateboards recalled worldwide after four deaths

articles.description: The UK and Nato say ammunition production must be ramped up so Ukraine can defend itself against Russia.
articles.title: Ukraine war: Western allies say they are running out of ammunition

articles.description: Dish Network will have to pay $150,000 for failing to move an old satellite far enough away from the Earth.
articles.title: US issues first ever fine for space junk to Dish Network

articles.description: Charlotte Sena, 9, was located after a round-the-clock hunt aided by the suspect's ransom note.
articles.title: Charlotte Sena: Missing girl found using fingerprints on ransom note
